title: Directories are not created recursively
body:
| Q                   | A
| --------------------| ---------------
| PHPUnit version   | 7.0.0
| PHP version          | 7.1.11 & PHP 7.2.1
| Xdebug version    | 2.5.5
| Installation Method | Composer
| CI environment | Travis CI

[This patch](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/php-code-coverage/commit/583c4e79cb597763b846010da6e423c4cdb2f39e#diff-19b24179073358fac0d4c1ab22d06243R237) should also be applied to https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/blob/ef2c7372cabee8d0eee0d60fd2e2cfb2e4b82ea3/src/Util/Printer.php#L56


Relevant issue: https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/php-code-coverage/issues/584.
